GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
media: venus: vdec: fixed possible memory leak issue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 55bccafc246b2e64763a155ec454470c07a54a6e, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 40d87aafee29fb01ce1e1868502fb2059a6a7f34. For more details please see the references link.
